page.title: 19A Day With Stephanie
page.content: I am 8 years old and I go to Bandon Hill Primary School in Wallington. I get up at 6.45am and have a wash and get dressed. Then I get our cats and my breakfast. I usually have toast butter and marmalade. Afterwards, I clean my teeth and pack my bags for school. I leave home at 8.10am with my mummy and younger brother. We leave early because mummy is our school lollipop lady. I play chase or skipping on the playground until the bell goes at 8.55am. We wait in our class lines for our teachers to take us to our classrooms. After the register we go to the hall for assembly, where we sing hymns and have a story and prayers. We spend the morning doing English or maths. We have playtime from 10.35 to 10.50am.6 By Brandon Hill School
